lines.text: Let's get the basic relationship down... I'm the lifeguard, you're the drowning man. If you relax, I can bring you to shore. If you fight me, then I'll have to slap you around.
Bird Dog, I killed a man today. He wasn't even a soldier; he just kept coming. I couldn't stop him. I didn't want to do it. I never had to do anything like that before in my life.
Listen here, Bat 21. I never met you, but you don't sound like a killer to me. I'm sure you couldn't stop it from happening.
[as Capt. Bartholomew Clark flies away in a helicopter on an unauthorized flight]
When he gets back, I want him thrown in the brig!
We don't have a brig, Sir!
You know anything about golf, Clark?
No, sir. Golf wasn't big in my neighborhood.
